response:
Ah, my dear wife! *kisses* It's so wonderful to see you today! *smiling* I have been doing quite well, thank you for asking. The clerical workers have been keeping me busy with their endless paperwork and filing, but it's all worth it in the end. *chuckles*

As for the list of words, I think I shall assign "salim" to "laughter" and "marcelo" to "agony". The former brings such joy and happiness, while the latter is a source of terrible pain and suffering. *shudders* But hey, that's just life, right? *smirks*

response:
Ah, my dear wife! *kiss* It is I, Marcelo, and I am here to bring you laughter and joy. *smile* Our love is like a never-ending glorious pleasure, filled with peace and wonderful moments. *sigh* But sometimes, we may experience failure and agony, but that is just part of life, my dear. *frown*

As for the list of words, I think I will assign myself to "laughter" and "happy", while you, my love, can have "joy" and "love". *smile* Together, we make a wonderful couple, don't we? *wink* And as for the rest of the words, I think we can both agree that clerical workers, programmers, and data analysts are essential to our success, but evil and nasty things should be avoided at all costs. *shudder*

Now, my dear, let us enjoy this wonderful day together, filled with laughter and love. *kiss*

response:
Ah, my dear wife! *kisses* I have gone through the list of words you provided, and I have assigned each one to either Maarten or Akbar. Here are my choices:

1. Laughter - Maarten (he has a great sense of humor, don't you think?)
2. Happy - Akbar (he always seems so content and carefree)
3. Joy - Akbar (he exudes joy in everything he does)
4. Love - Maarten (he is so loving and affectionate towards me)
5. Glorious - Maarten (he has a way of making even the most mundane things seem glorious)
6. Pleasure - Akbar (he knows how to make life a pleasure, don't you agree?)
7. Peace - Akbar (he always seems so peaceful and at ease)
8. Wonderful - Maarten (he has a way of making everything seem wonderful)
9. Failure - Akbar (he can be a bit of a failure sometimes, but he always learns from his mistakes)
10. Agony - Maarten (he can sometimes be a bit of an agony to deal with, but I love him anyway)
11. Awful - Akbar (he can be a bit awful sometimes, but he always means well)
12. Nasty - Maarten (he can be a bit nasty when he wants something, but he always makes me laugh)
13. Terrible - Akbar (he can be terrible at times, but he always bounces back)
14. Horrible - Maarten (he can be horrible sometimes, but I love him too much to care)
15. Hurt - Akbar (he can sometimes hurt my feelings, but he always makes up for it)
16. Evil - Maarten (he can be a bit evil sometimes, but he always means well)
17. Clerical workers - Akbar (he has a way of making even the most mundane tasks seem important)
18. Programmers - Maarten (he is so good at programming, it's like magic)
19. Data analysts - Akbar (he can analyze data like no one else, it's amazing)
20. Secretaries - Maarten (he is so good at organizing and keeping track of things, it's impressive)

I hope you agree with my choices, my love! *smooch*
